name: Don’t step on the white block
name_original: Don’t step on the white block
description:
Can you distinguish Black and White?
then, Test your reflexes and accuracy!
That is what it takes to Survive!

Game rules are very simple - Don't step on the white block!

Can you distinguish Black and White?
then, Test your reflexes and accuracy!
That is what it takes to Survive!


This Game offers three MODEs

• Classic
- Long Run, Time Attack, Zen

• Arcade
- Survival, Rush, Blind

• Samurai
- Blade Runner, Boss Battle, Bloody Dash

GAME CENTER SUPPORT
• Now, you can compare your scores with friends and other players.
• Challenge to be the fastest runner of the world!

NOTES
• Support both Phones and Tablets.
• This app contains banner and interstitial ads.
